value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11260v1", "title": "$QQ$-systems and tropical geometry", "summary": "We investigate the system of polynomial equations, known as $QQ$-systems,\nwhich are closely related to the so-called Bethe ansatz equations of the XXZ\nspin chain, using the methods of tropical geometry.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,hep-th,math-ph,math.MP,math.QA,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-15T14:59:26Z"}
